articles.title: MATCH PREVIEW: Inter Miami CF to Host Charlotte FC This Friday in Leagues Cup Quarterfinals - Inter Miami CF
articles.description:
Inter Miami CF will continue its run in the 2023 Leagues Cup this Friday, August 11 when it hosts Charlotte FC for quarterfinals action. Kick off at DRV PNK Stadium is set for 8:30 p.m. ET.
